AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: young wizard
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: At a very early age, [PAWN_nameDef] showed amazing magic abilities. [PAWN_pronoun] easily absorbed knowledge and mastered basic magic formulas.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: glitter fan
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a special love for collecting crystals and colorful stones. [PAWN_pronoun] made amazing trinkets out of them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: gifted magician
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born with an incredible talent for magic. [PAWN_possessive] knowledge and skills in this field amazed even experienced and skillful unicorns.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: horned knight
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Fascinated by the tales of faraway Equestria, [PAWN_nameDef] often imagined {PAWN_gender ? himself : herself} as a medieval knight. [PAWN_pronoun] made homemade armor and wore it all the time.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: incapable of sorcery
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: From an early age, it became apparent that [PAWN_nameDef]'s magical abilities were quite modest. [PAWN_possessive] knowledge of magic was minimal, but [PAWN_possessive] knowledge in other areas was becoming broader and deeper.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: arrogant prince
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a wealthy family and knew neither want nor anxiety. All [PAWN_possessive] wishes were instantly fulfilled. [PAWN_pronoun] was too arrogant to condescend to socialize with others or to do even the simplest of jobs.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: damaged horn
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: One day during a game there was an accident, as a result of which [PAWN_nameDef] injured [PAWN_possessive] horn. After that everyone began to avoid [PAWN_possessive]. Communication with others practically came to naught, and when [PAWN_nameDef] grew up, [PAWN_pronoun] hated the whole world.
